message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something fair. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'll meet you in the middle, don't wait for inflation to get worse for me
Okay, let's try this again.  This offer is even better than the last, and time is running out for both of us!
I'm still willing to compromise, but don't think I'll go much lower
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer, or I'm going for the win on the next round.  This is your last chance!
